descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LaMelo Ball comes off the screen and drops a no-look dime to Nick Richards for the slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo goes no look to Richards for the dunk) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo goes no look to Richards for the dunk

videos.description: Kelly Oubre Jr. finds a rolling Mason Plumlee for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Oubre goes up top to Plumlee for jam) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Oubre goes up top to Plumlee for jam

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets a little luck on the 3-pointer as he banks it in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo goes glass on the 3) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo goes glass on the 3

videos.description: LaMelo Ball shows off the handles and gets to the bucket for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo puts the moves on for sweet bucket) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo puts the moves on for sweet bucket

videos.description: LaMelo Ball ropes a bounce pass to Gordon Hayward for the easy dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo threads needle to Hayward for the dunk) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo threads needle to Hayward for the dunk

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets into the lane with a spin move and finishes the shot before the halftime buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lamelo beats first-half buzzer with impressive finish) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lamelo beats first-half buzzer with impressive finish

videos.description: Chris Duarte avoids the turnover, then goes around the defender for sweet reverse layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Duarte keeps ball in bounds, then finishes sweet layup) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Duarte keeps ball in bounds, then finishes sweet layup

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis takes Mason Plumlee to the paint and flushes the dunk over him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sabonis bodies Plumlee for big dunk) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis bodies Plumlee for big dunk

videos.description: Kelly Oubre Jr. impresses with nice basket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kelly Oubre Jr. impresses with nice basket) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kelly Oubre Jr. impresses with nice basket

videos.description: Gordon Hayward banks in the 3-pointer, quieting Indiana's crowd.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hayward banks in big 3 at the end of the third) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayward banks in big 3 at the end of the third

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets into the lane and finds Mason Plumlee for the dunk, putting the Hornets up seven with under a minute left in the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo ices win with assist to Plumlee for dunk) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo ices win with assist to Plumlee for dunk
